summary: Completed frontend testing of Arabic chat application. Login functionality works with any email/password as expected. However, discovered critical routing issues preventing access to chat-specific pages (/chat, /settings, /create-group, /create-channel) - all redirect to /rider dashboard.

routing_issues.issue: Chat-related pages (/chat, /settings, /create-group, /create-channel) redirect to /rider instead of loading properly

ui_bugs.issue: Chat page accessible via direct URL but shows rider dashboard content instead of chat interface

integration_issues.issue: User cannot access chat features from rider dashboard - no visible navigation to chat pages

passed_tests: Login works with any email and password (demo mode)
Arabic interface displays correctly with RTL support
Landing page loads and login flow works
User gets redirected to /rider dashboard after login
Frontend service is running and accessible

success_percentage.frontend: 40% - Login works but chat features inaccessible due to routing issues

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix routing configuration to allow access to chat pages (/chat, /settings, /create-group, /create-channel). Currently all protected routes redirect to /rider dashboard. Check ProtectedRoute component logic and userType handling in App.js. The chat functionality exists but is not accessible through normal navigation.
